entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@IvankaTrump How the WH handles COVID19 can MAKE or BREAK the ELECTION! 

Larry K’s comments abt COVID19 were completely OFF.  

Life vs 401K? Life is #1! 

When voters are concerned for the lives of themselves, their children n loved ones, nothing else matters!

WH must ACT fast!
